hero.title: Connecting the
hero.subtitle: Pluribus is building the future of international commerce by making it simple, secure, and accessible for buyers and sellers everywhere.

story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: From a simple idea to a global platform

beginning.title: The Beginning
beginning.description: Pluribus was founded on a simple observation: billions of people worldwide want access to products they can't find locally, but the process is complicated, expensive, and often unreliable. We saw an opportunity to create a better way.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We set out to eliminate the barriers of international commerce. By connecting buyers with trustworthy sellers across the globe, we're creating a marketplace where anyone can shop globally as easily as shopping locally.

today.title: Today & Beyond
today.description: Today, Pluribus connects thousands of buyers and sellers across 50+ countries. We're continuously innovating, adding new features, and expanding our reach to make international shopping truly accessible to everyone.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.subtitle: Pluribus is more than just a marketplace—it's a complete platform designed to make international commerce simple and secure

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: These principles guide every decision we make and shape our culture

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied buyers and sellers transforming international commerce

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Passionate people from around the world working together to transform global commerce

comingSoon.title: Meet the Team Coming Soon
comingSoon.description: We're building an amazing team of engineers, designers, and operators dedicated to making international commerce accessible to everyone. Check back soon to meet the people behind Pluribus!

cta.title: Ready to Be Part of Our Story?
cta.subtitle: Join Pluribus today and become part of a global community transforming how people shop internationally. Whether you're a buyer seeking global products or a seller looking to reach new markets, we're here to help you succeed.

hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.subtitle: We're here to help! Whether you have questions about our platform, need support, or want to partner with us, our team is ready to assist.

email.title: Email
email.description: Send us an email and we'll respond within 24 hours.

phone.title: Phone
phone.description: Call us during business hours (9 AM - 6 PM UTC)

social.title: Connect With Us
social.subtitle: Follow our social media channels for updates, news, and community discussions about Pluribus.

quickHelp.title: Quick Help
quickHelp.subtitle: Can't find what you're looking for? Check out our FAQ or knowledge base.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Browse our comprehensive FAQ section to find answers to common questions about buying, selling, payments, and shipping.

liveChat.title: Live Chat Support
liveChat.description: For immediate assistance, open our live chat to connect with our support team. Available 24/7 for urgent issues.

responseTime.title: We Value Your Time
responseTime.subtitle: We're committed to responding to all inquiries as quickly as possible. Here's what to expect:

cta.title: Have a General Question?
cta.subtitle: Check out our how-it-works guide for detailed information about using Pluribus as a buyer or seller.

hero.title: How Can We
hero.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Pluribus. Browse our FAQ or contact our support team.

buyer.description: Learn how to find products, place orders, and track deliveries

support.title: Still Need Help?
support.subtitle: Didn't find the answer you were looking for? Our support team is here to help.

hero.subtitle: Discover the simple process behind connecting global buyers and sellers. Whether you're looking to purchase or sell, we've made international delivery accessible and secure for everyone.

why.title: Why Pluribus?
why.subtitle: We've built a platform that removes the barriers of international shopping, making it as easy as local commerce.

hero.title: Privacy
hero.subtitle: At Pluribus, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring transparency in how we collect, use, and manage your personal data. This privacy policy outlines our practices in compliance with GDPR and other applicable regulations.

disclaimer.title: Important Legal Notice
disclaimer.description: This privacy policy is a template provided for informational purposes. While it reflects standard data protection practices, it should be reviewed and customized by a qualified legal professional to ensure full compliance with applicable laws in your jurisdiction. Pluribus cannot be held responsible for any gaps or misalignment with local regulations.

cta.title: Your Privacy Matters to Us
cta.description: We are committed to transparency and putting you in control of your personal data. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out.

footer.effective: This privacy policy is effective as of February 8, 2025. Last updated: February 8, 2025. Please review our
footer.forAdditional: for additional important information about using Pluribus.

hero.title: Terms of Service
hero.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using the Pluribus platform

disclaimer.title: Legal Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: This Terms of Service is a template and should be reviewed by legal counsel before deployment in a production environment. It may require customization based on your specific business requirements, jurisdictional regulations, and operational practices.

cta.title: Have Questions?
cta.description: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please reach out to our support team. We're here to help.

createOrder.title: Create Custom Order
createOrder.subtitle: Submit a request for a custom product or service

form.title: Order Title
form.titleDescription: Give your order a clear, descriptive title
form.descriptionDescription: Be as specific as possible to help sellers understand your needs
form.itemsDescription: Add specific items you need (great for shopping lists)
form.deadlineDescription: When do you need this completed?
form.addressPlaceholder: Full address where order should be delivered
form.phoneDescription: Sellers may need to contact you
form.attachDescription: Upload reference images, documents, or specifications (optional)
form.notesPlaceholder: Any other details sellers should know...
form.allowOffersDescription: Sellers can submit their best prices and proposals
form.photosDescription: Upload up to 5 photos (JPEG, PNG, WebP). Max 5MB per photo.
form.dateOption: Specify the date until the order is valid
form.deliveryTypeDescription: Choose whether you need this urgently or have a specific deadline
form.specificDateDescription: Choose a date when you need the order delivered
form.addressDescription: Provide the complete address where you want the order delivered
form.cardDescription: Describe what you're looking for and the seller will review your request
form.cardDescriptionWithSeller: Send a custom order request to {sellerName}

validation.titleMinLength: Title must be at least 5 characters
validation.titleMaxLength: Title must be no more than 100 characters
validation.descriptionMinLength: Description must be at least 20 characters
validation.descriptionMaxLength: Description must be no more than 5000 characters
validation.deadlineInvalid: Deadline must be in the future
validation.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number
validation.addressMinLength: Delivery address must be at least 10 characters
validation.addressMaxLength: Delivery address must not exceed 500 characters
validation.photosMinCount: Please upload at least one photo
validation.photosMaxCount: You can upload up to 5 photos
validation.photoSizeExceeded: Each photo must be less than 5MB
validation.photoTypeInvalid: Only JPEG, PNG, and WebP images are supported
validation.deadlineOrAsapRequired: Please either select ASAP or specify a delivery deadline
validation.deadlinePastDate: Delivery deadline must be today or in the future
